text: @realDonaldTrump Who wrote this tweet? Also, don't be distracted. #TrumpShitTheBed on #COVID19. Now's he's desperately trying to make up for it by pushing unproven and even deadly remedy while trying to shift responsibility to anyone but himself - Governors, WHO, Obama, the media etc.
